definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: I was sent here by the Transportation Ministry in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我是北京交通部派來的。

sentences.english: North Carolina Department of Transportation (NCDOT) is using traffic-count-based VMT estimation method.
sentences.chinese: 北卡交通部目前使用的正是基於交通量的方法。

sentences.english: The super transport ministry has been established in the super ministry reform of the State Council recently.
sentences.chinese: 近期國務院實行了大部制改革，成立了大交通部。

sentences.english: Cameroon Ministry of Communications has also ordered three companies of informal long-distance passenger business for rectification.
sentences.chinese: 喀交通部還勒令三家非正規長途客運公司停業整頓。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Ministry of Communications of the PRC is the institution in charge of the nation-wide highway undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 第三條中華人民共和國交通部主管全國公路事業。

sentences.english: The transport sector will Silverstrand Fu Xian Xianyang paragraph to carry out special maintenance training.
sentences.chinese: 交通部門將對福銀線西安至咸陽段進行專項維修整治。

sentences.english: An official letter issued by MOTC or DGT to reject the application made by the applicant.
sentences.chinese: 交通部或電信總局駁回申請人之申請案之公文。

sentences.english: With regards to slicks , he suggests that DOT tires are better investments.
sentences.chinese: 對於以幹胎，他認爲，交通部輪胎更好的投資。

sentences.english: Last week, the Department of Transportation released a slew of new rules that will affect the air travel experience.
sentences.chinese: 上週，交通部出臺了一系列影響空中旅行的新規定。

sentences.english: Johnson appointed Alan S . Boyd as the first Transportation Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 約翰遜任命艾倫博伊德爲第一人交通部長。

sentences.english: German Transport Minister Wolfgang Tiefensee has rejected the idea.
sentences.chinese: 德國交通部長蒂芬謝已否決該構想。

sentences.english: But the transportation minister refused to offer any hypothesis about what happened.
sentences.chinese: 但是交通部長拒絕提供任何關於所發生事件的假說。

sentences.english: He drove quickly so he often got ticketed by the police from the Miristry of Transportation.
sentences.chinese: 有時候開車開得快一點，就會被交通部的警察開罰單。

sentences.english: A document evidencing the approval of the code of practices by MOTC.
sentences.chinese: 公司營業規章經交通部覈定之證明文件。

sentences.english: Aren't you a little young to be Secretary of Transportation?
sentences.chinese: 你當交通部長會不會太年輕了一點啊？

sentences.english: Transportation minister T.R. Baalu says there is not much leeway to reduce taxes.
sentences.chinese: 然而印度交通部長巴魯說，減少稅收的空間不大。

definition: Ministry of Railways (MOR), disbanded in 2013 with its regulatory functions taken over by the Ministry of Transport 交通運輸部|交通运输部[Jiao1 tong1 Yun4 shu1 bu4]
abbr. for 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会, PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
PRC National Development and Reform Commission
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 Gai3 ge2 Wei3
Zhong1 guo2 Min2 yong4 Hang2 kong1 ju2

definition: Ministry of Justice (PRC etc)/Justice Department (USA etc)
PRC State Planning Committee, abbr. for 國家計劃委員會|国家计划委员会[Guo2 jia1 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
